name: Boolet
description:
Boolet (Boolean and Bullet) is an epic one button SMHUP heavily inspired by Switch 'n' Shoot.  This is a game made for the GeoJam. It fits the theme because you switch the direction.

Controls -

Space to switch direction

Note -

The game is not infinite, there is an end

The enemies change colours on dying, this is only visual and does not change their behaviour. 

Credits

All art is original and made by me

All code and game design is done by me 

Music by:  https://opengameart.org/content/cyberpunk-moonlight-sonata

Software Used

Game making - Construct 3

Art - LibreSprite (Aseprite)

MADE IS LESS THAN 24 HOURS
